Sir Jayantilal Keshavji "Andy" Chande KBE (7 Mee 1928 - 7 Eprel 2017) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Tanzania a ma ama, onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka na onye freemason
A na-akwanyere ya ùgwù maka ihe niile dị mma o mere n'ime mba ahụ, dịka aka ya dị arọ n'ịzụlite usoro agụmakwụkwọ ka mma, mana ọ bụkwa onye isi ụlọ ọrụ nke nwere ike ịgafe ahịa Tanzania.
Chande bụ onye isi oche nke Board of Governors nke Shaaban Robert Secondary School na onye isi oche nke Dar es Salaam Secondary Education Society
Ọ bụkwa onye nlekọta na-asọpụrụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Indian - Dar es Salaam
Ọ natara President's Golden Century Citation site na Rotary International maka nraranye ya na nkwa ya na 1995/1996
O nwetakwara ihe nrite 'Service Above Self' n'afọ 1998 site n'aka Rotary International maka nkwanye ùgwù maka afọ ole ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka ntọala ahụ
N'afọ 2003, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nlekọta nke Rotary Foundation ma n'afọ 2004 a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi oche nke Rotary Foundation nke United Kingdom
N'afọ 2003, ọ natara onyinye 'Hind Ratna' site n'aka I.K
Gujral, onye bụbu Prime Minista India
International Congress of Non-Resident Indians (NRI) kwupụtara na ọ bụ 'onye India na-abụghị onye bi n'afọ'
E nyekwara ya Pride of India Gold Award site n'aka NRI Institute na London.
Emere ya onye na-asọpụrụ Knight Commander of the Most Excellent Order of the British Empire na abalị iri na iteolu na onwa  asatọ, na afọ 2003, nke mbụ n'ụdị ya nyere nwa amaala Tanzania.
Na abalị iteolu, na onwa Jenụwarị, na afọ 2005, Onye isi ala India, Dr APJ Abdul Kalam nyere ya Pravasi Bharatiya Samman Award.

Na abalị iri, na onwa Ọgọstụ, na afọ 2007, onye isi ala Tanzania, Jakaya Kikwete malitere nsụgharị Swahili nke akwụkwọ ya A Knight in Africa (Shujaa Katika Afrika: Safari Kutoka Bukene) na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Shaaban Robert Secondary School
